# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a document menu from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Creating a document menu

- **init(documentTypes:in:)**: Initializes and returns a document menu to import or open the given file types.
- **init(url:in:)**: Initializes and returns a document menu to export or move the given document.

items.description: Initializes and returns a document menu to import or open the given file types.

items.description: Initializes and returns a document menu to export or move the given document.
